title: The frontend doesn't show
body:
Hi !
I'm trying to run the frontend with the `npm run dev` but when it get launched I get a white screen. I also get this in my developper console :

`Uncaught (in promise) DOMException: An invalid or illegal string was specified`
`setupWebSocket client:536`
`fallback client:509`
`setupWebSocket client:555`
`setupWebSocket client:552`
`<anonymous> client:531`
`client:536`
`setupWebSocket client:536`
`fallback client:509`
`setupWebSocket client:555`
`(Asynchrone : EventListener.handleEvent)`
`setupWebSocket client:552`
`<anonyme> client:531`

I guess he doesn't really like it 😅 
If you know how to sole this problem it would be great, thanks by advance <3
author: HappySunnySun

comments.body: Can you send the full error (screenshot)? Also, what version of Node are you using? I did it on v20 so if you have an older version that's probably it.
Hello, I had the same error as you when trying to use the program, just try changing browser and it should work. (Doesn't work on Arc browser but worked on Microsoft Edge).

My frontend isnt working either it just shows white, i keep getting this "(node:18488) [DEP0060] DeprecationWarning: The `util._extend` API is deprecated. Please use Object.assign() instead." and im using node version 22.13
It's probably your adblocker installed on Firefox. ^^
